de.hadizadeh.positioning.roommodel

Class ContentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hadizadeh.positioning.roommodel.ContentController

  • public class ContentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the loading process and actions with content elements and content groups

      • preloadAllContents

        public void preloadAllContents(java.lang.String workingDir)
                        throws de.hadizadeh.positioning.content.exceptions.ContentPersistenceException
        Loads all contents to a map. Should be called in a thread.
        Parameters:
        workingDir - directory where the content is stored
        Throws:
        de.hadizadeh.positioning.content.exceptions.ContentPersistenceException - if the content could not be loaded

        position - new position
